Label: Currency code
Description: An ONIX code identifying the currency in which the <PriceAmount> in an occurrence of the <ComparisonProductPrice> composite is stated. Optional and non-repeating, but required if the currency is not the default currency for the ONIX message. To avoid any possible ambiguity, it is strongly recommended that the currency should be stated here.
Format: <dd>Fixed length, three letters, based on ISO 4217. Note that ISO 4217 specifies that currency codes shall be sent as upper case only</dd>
